RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Custom Pattern Navigation
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ] & Angel Draganov
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Adds keybindings to jump an arbitrary amount of lines in the Pattern Editor. When activated, two new key binding entries will show up in 'Pattern Editor', 'Navigation': 'Custom Jump Lines Up' and Custom Jump Lines Down. Those keybindings can then be configured with in the 'Tools' menu.
